title: A New Beginning
prompt: You now know the truth. Riley watches you carefully, waiting to see what you'll do with this knowledge. The weight of the revelation sits heavy between you both. This is a crucial moment - your response will determine what happens next. Riley is supportive but needs to know you're ready to move forward.
intro: The silence stretches between you as the truth sinks in. Everything has changed.

goals.description: Help the player come to terms with the revelation and decide their next steps. Ensure they feel empowered despite the difficult truth.

outro: Riley nods with respect. 'You handled that better than most. I think we're going to make a good team.' The journey has just begun... [End of Demo]
